sandboxlink-subpage-name: Name of the subpage where user's sandbox will be created. For example, 'sandbox' means that the link in personal tools menu will point to "User:Example/sandbox".
sandboxlink-portlet-label: Label of the link in personal tools menu.
tooltip-pt-sandbox: Tooltip of the link in personal tools menu.
sandboxlink-editintro-pagename:
{{ignore}}
Title of the page that will be used as the 'editintro' parameter in the link in personal tools menu. '-' means the parameter won't be added.
sandboxlink-preload-pagename:
{{ignore}}
Title of the page that will be used as the 'preload' parameter in the link in personal tools menu. '-' means the parameter won't be added.
